name: Racing Club
description:
Racing Club is a brand new racing and driving simulation game. Get ready for a race in traffic with your friends!

MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE
Are you ready for a realistic race with other players? Absolutely real-time multiplayer racing experience.
Choose your room, put your money in, and if you win, you will double your money.

CLUB MEMBERSHIP
You can be club member through the money your earned or bought from the store. Having a club membership gives you advantage in the race. If you buy one of the Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum memberships, you can join to races for free and you can use some cars for free.

BE BRAVE AND FAST
Weave through traffic while driving in high speed. You will earn more money, if you drive more dangerously.

REAL HD GRAPHICS
Completely designed as three dimensional, Racing Club was developed in order to provide you a realistic racing experience. Unbelievable graphics are awaiting for you.

REALISTIC WEATHER
Get ready to race in Snowy, Rainy, and Foggy conditions.

AMAZING CARS
Tens of amazing cars. Change the color, have a tattoo, and create your own dream car.

SLOW CAMERA MODE
This mode can be activated only on single player mode. Camera may save you by slowing down.

VARIOUS RACING PLACES
Get ready to race in Village, Desert, City, and on Highway.
It was developed in four places as three dimensional. And the realistic environment was created for you.

YOU HAVE THE CONTROL
Control your vehicle as you like.
You may control your vehicle by Wheel, Buttons, Acceleration, and Game Controller.

MULTIPLE CAMERA
Drive your car through any of the 4 camera angles. Have a realistic experience through cockpit cam.

MULTI LANGUAGES
More than one languages.

WORLD RANK
Get the highest scores and take the highest place in world rank.
You can see your friends’ scores instantly.


GENERAL FEATURES
- Amazing 3D graphics
- Realistic car driving
- Four Levels: Village, Desert, City, Highway
- Three different weather conditions: Snowy, Rainy, Foggy weather conditions
- Different game modes
- Four different camera angles
- Realistic traffic systems
- Multi language support
- Graphics level adjustments
- Vehicle control settings
- Club memberships: Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum
